boardgame.name: Lost Legacy: The Starship
Zaginione Dziedzictwo: Przybysz
Ztracené Dědictví: Hvězdný Koráb
Тайное наследие: Звездолёт
boardgame.description: Lost Legacy: The Starship is a game of risk, deduction, and luck for 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;4 players. You start the game with one card in hand from a deck of sixteen cards. On a turn, you do the following:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Draw: Draw the top card from the deck and add it to your hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play: Choose one of the two cards in hand to play and place it face up in front of you._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Effect: Carry out the played card's effect, after which the card is considered as discarded._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; End: If there is at least one card left in the deck, the turn goes to the next player; if not, the investigation phase starts. Using the investigation speed indicated on the card each player has in hand, players take turns guessing which player (whether yourself or someone else) holds the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Lost Legacy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card; this card might also be in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Ruins_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, a location that holds one card at the start of the game and possibly acquires more cards during play. The player who guesses correctly wins; if no one finds the Lost Legacy, then everybody loses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By combining different Lost Legacy sets (while keeping only a single Lost Legacy card in play), up to six players can compete at the same time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the English release of the 16 cards The Starship set in Lost Legacy. The Flying Garden set is released separately._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5811) Lost Legacy is a card game of risk, deduction and luck, designed by Kanai (Love Letter) and Hayato Kisaragi. Players start with one card in hand, and then draw and/or play cards from the 16 card deck, until the cards run out. Then the investigation stage starts, with players trying to determine who has the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Lost Legacy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; card. The player with the highest point total at the end wins.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5811) Lost Legacy is a card game of risk, deduction and luck, designed by Kanai (Love Letter) and Hayato Kisaragi. Players start with one card in hand, and then draw and/or play cards from the 16 card deck, until the cards run out. Then the investigation stage starts, with players trying to determine who has the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Lost Legacy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; card. The player with the highest point total at the end wins.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5811) Lost Legacy is a card game of risk, deduction and luck, designed by Kanai (Love Letter) and Hayato Kisaragi. Players start with one card in hand, and then draw and/or play cards from the 16 card deck, until the cards run out. Then the investigation stage starts, with players trying to determine who has the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Lost Legacy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; card. The player with the highest point total at the end wins.
